hero.title: Fast, reliable tech solutions
hero.subtitle: From cracked screens to software issues, we fix it all with professional service and honest pricing. Same-day repairs available for most devices.
hero.imageAlt: Professional tech repair shop with modern equipment and skilled technicians

about.title: Our Story
about.body: Founded in 2018 by certified technician Alex Chen, TechFix Pro has become the trusted name for device repair in our community. Our team combines technical expertise with exceptional customer service to get your devices working like new.
about.subtitle: Why choose TechFix Pro

owner.name: Alex Chen
owner.title: Owner & Lead Technician
owner.bio: Certified Apple and Samsung technician with 8+ years of experience. Alex specializes in complex repairs and has trained technicians across multiple locations.

products.name: Screen Replacement
products.description: Professional screen replacement for iPhone and Android devices with OEM-quality parts

products.name: Battery Replacement
products.description: Replace your old battery with a new one to restore full performance and battery life

products.name: Data Recovery
products.description: Professional data recovery from damaged drives and devices

products.name: Hardware Repair
products.description: Fix hardware issues including motherboard, RAM, and hard drive problems

products.name: Software Issues
products.description: Virus removal, OS reinstallation, and software troubleshooting

products.name: Water Damage Repair
products.description: Professional water damage assessment and repair with ultrasonic cleaning

items.text: Excellent customer service and quality work. My iPad is working perfectly after their repair.
